DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety, pharmacokinetics and pharmacodynamics of single doses of BMS-686117
DOC.brief_title: Study to Evaluate the Safety, Pharmacokinetics, and Pharmacodynamics of BMS-686117 in Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of Type 2 diabetes for ≥ 3 months treated with metformin, thiazolidinedione, or sulfonylurea (either monotherapy or combination) or diet alone (drug naïve) Fasting plasma glucose: 126 240 mg/dL Hemoglobin A1c: 6 10% Estimated CrCl ≥ 60 mL/min ALT ≤ 1.5 x ULN and total bilirubin ≤ 2 x ULN Stable and well controlled hypertension and/or dyslipidemia Concomitant medications used for hypertension and/or dyslipidemia, thyroid hormone replacement therapy and low dose aspirin will be allowed if stable for at least 6 weeks Women of childbearing potential Symptomatic diabetes with polyuria and/or polydipsia History of diabetic ketoacidosis or hyperosmolar nonketotic syndrome History of renal disease including diabetic nephropathy
